<title level="1" right="Rules">[Class](/Rules.aspx?ID=3293)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A class represents the adventuring profession chosen by a character. A character's class determines most of their proficiencies, grants the character Hit Points each time they gain a new level, and gives access to a set of class feats. Classes appear in [Chapter 3](/Rules.aspx?ID=2098).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
